column2: "Merry Christmas, brother! This is for you. What do you think...?"
"My, my...! The sparkle of the crystal is quite breathtaking. This is a beautiful wine glass."
"My, my...! The sparkle of the crystal is quite breathtaking. This is a beautiful wine glass."

"Thank you, truly.
...To tell you the truth, I have a gift for you too. Merry Christmas, Harriet."

"This bottle... is this wine? The smell is so rich...
But, brother..."

"This bottle... is this wine? The smell is so rich...
But, brother..."
"Naturally, given your age, it is strictly non-alcoholic. But the taste should be the same."
"I stumbled across this wine recipe by chance in the course of some grape experimentation. Doesn't it look nice in your glass?"
"I stumbled across this wine recipe by chance in the course of some grape experimentation. Doesn't it look nice in your glass?"
"Brother... I'm so happy! Let us use this wine and these glasses to make a toast at once! ...Cheers!"
"Brother... I'm so happy! Let us use this wine and these glasses to make a toast at once! ...Cheers!"

"Oh, I almost forgot! I have a surprise for you too, Guardian...
Is something the matter?"

"An emergency request from the Christmas venue...?
In that case, the surprise can wait. Please, return safely."
